data.title: West Campus
data.meta_description: Information about parking and driving directions to OHSU's West Campus, including information for the Oregon National Primate Research Center and the Science and Engineering Schools.
data.text: OHSU's West Campus is home to the Oregon National Primate Research Center and the Vaccine and Gene Therapy Institute, some administrative and technical support offices, and a data center. The beautiful 166-acre campus is located in the northwest part of Portland's metro area, bordering the cities of Hillsboro and Beaverton.
